article.headline: Charting an August breakout attempt, Nasdaq rallies to record territory
article.body: U.S. stocks are firmly higher early Monday, rising to start August amid a rotation back toward large-cap technology. Against this backdrop, the Nasdaq Composite has tagged its latest record high early Monday, while the S&P 500 has reached five-month highs, breaking from a jagged July range. Before detailing the U.S. markets’ wider view,...
